channel.title: Banner Request
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm requesting a banner for the forums that are being developed.
You can view the picture [url=http://[url=http://puu.sh/2Hfp3.png]http://puu.sh/2Hfp3.png[/url]]here so the color would be orange of course. The dimensions are 130 x 105 but I'm sort of wanting to experiment with this as I know if I get a banner that small, it'd look a bit weird and a lot of open space would surround that entire area.
The text could be a simple one with "TwistedFate" would be perfect. And to be quite fair, I'm not sure how I'd like this to be turned out because I figured that most banners that are provided will fit the theme itself (theme being Carbon Orange) so that's the reason I provided a picture because I know people will be able to match it almost near-perfectly.
Thank you.

item.title: Banner Request
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Hi,

I’m requesting a banner for the forums that are being developed.

You can view the picture http://puu.sh/2Hfp3.png]here so the color would be orange of course. The dimensions are 130 x 105 but I’m sort of wanting to experiment with this as I know if I get a banner that small, it’d look a bit weird and a lot of open space would surround that entire area.

The text could be a simple one with “TwistedFate” would be perfect. And to be quite fair, I’m not sure how I’d like this to be turned out because I figured that most banners that are provided will fit the theme itself (theme being Carbon Orange) so that’s the reason I provided a picture because I know people will be able to match it almost near-perfectly.

Thank you.
